text:
I’m sure this question has been asked a billion times, my client has a blog on a subdomain - <http://blog.domain-name.com|blog.domain-name.com>
Is there a way to get native search to pull results from there as well?
You can clone the search input and adjust it to include these parameters

thank you. So would `domain=<http://blog.domain-name.com|blog.domain-name.com>` exclude the root domain (<http://domain-name.com|domain-name.com>).

Would I just use `domain=<http://blog.domain-name.com|blog.domain-name.com>,<http://domain-name.com|domain-name.com>`
Since this channel is called _site-search-feedback_, I just want to give some feedback: Y’all did a great job! Our clients love it… from autocomplete to the results page. kudos
